Assignment: 2024 Incident Scenerios

Points: 100.0
Submission Types: online_upload

scenarios.name: Cloud Storage
scenarios.scenario: One of your organization’s internal departments frequently uses outside cloud storage to store large amounts of data, some of which may be sensitive. You have recently learned that the cloud storage provider being used has been publicly compromised and large amounts of data have been exposed. All user passwords and data in the cloud provider’s infrastructure may have been compromised.How do you respond?
scenarios.containment:

scenarios.name: PII Accident
scenarios.scenario: You receive news that one of your employees has accidentally disclosed sensitive personally identifiable information (PII) for over 200 clients and personnel. This occurred when they emailed a document that had not been properly scrubbed to a contractor. The employee had been recently trained on PII handling.How do you respond?
